[center][color=teal][size=5][font=Arial][b]Finish what you started. In Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus, complete the mission unveiled in the first opus of one of the most acclaimed FPS games on Android, this time on fronts all all over the globe. Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus further improves the exemplary gameplay of the first Modern Combat game for an astounding immersion in a modern war experience and  the one of the most complete FPS multiplayer games on Android.[/b][/font][/size][/color][/center]
[hr]

[center][color=blue][size=6][font=Arial][b]Features:[/b][/font][/size][/color][/center]

[center][color=aqua][size=5][font=Arial][b]The best FPS controls on Android for a smooth and intuitive gaming experience.

Throw yourself into 12 battlefields set in the Middle-East,Eastern Europe and South America.

Use 15 weapons from real military forces that you can now gather directly from your enemies.

Engage in 10-player online and local confrontations. [/b][/font][/size][/color][/center]
